mapper.select: select employee_id, first_name, last_name, email, hire_date, salary, job_id, department_id, manager_id from employees
select employee_id, first_name, last_name, email, hire_date, salary, job_id, department_id, manager_id from employees where employee_id = #{employeeId}
mapper.insert: insert into employees ( employee_id, first_name, last_name, email, hire_date, job_id, department_id, manager_id ) values ( #{employeeId}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{hireDate}, #{jobId}, #{departmentId}, #{managerId} )
